page.title: 03Employment in Mayfield
page.content: The area lacks any major employment, especially for the young.Its for this reason that many people who live in the area have to commute to neighbouring towns such as Tunbridge Wells,Heathfield & Brighton,as well as London which is only an hours drive away. There is employment on various farms_ dairy,chicken,stud,& arable.In the village the shops,banks,hotel & public houses provide employment as well as the Convent School,Mayfield College, Mayfield Children's Home & the Old People's Home.Mayfield has a milk transporting company which employs mostly local men as lorry drivers. Mayfield has a few specialist employers such as a tennis racket stringer,harpsicord maker,building company etc.all create employment for local people.
